title: Breakingviews TV: Pay ratios
text:
Breakingviews TV: Pay ratios 8:08pm IST - 04:16 
U.S. companies’ first disclosures of CEO-to-employee pay ratios produce some surprises. Richard Beales and Tom Buerkle explain why Lloyd Blankfein’s ratio is much lower than Jamie Dimon’s (Goldman bankers earn a lot) and S&P Global’s is so high (lots of staff in India). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. companies’ first disclosures of CEO-to-employee pay ratios produce some surprises. Richard Beales and Tom Buerkle explain why Lloyd Blankfein’s ratio is much lower than Jamie Dimon’s (Goldman bankers earn a lot) and S&P Global’s is so high (lots of staff in India).
